about_the_game:
The Last Signal is a retro-futuristic sci-fi narrative adventure game. Follow Simon Scott and his five crewmates aboard the USS Moira on a critical mission to deflect a planet-killer asteroid heading for Earth. With a ten-year journey, divided into five years out and five years back, a lot can happen...

An Immersive Atmosphere

The Last Signal offers a stunning audiovisual experience. The meticulously crafted environment reflects a true passion for science fiction and storytelling.

Puzzles and Mini-Games

Discover a variety of puzzles and mini-games designed to enrich your experience.

Shadows, Lights, Sounds and Optimizations

The Last Signal features incredible 3D sound and visual ambiance with impeccable optimization. A lot of work has gone into these aspects to offer you the best possible experience, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in a science fiction story with a totally unexpected ending.

Interaction with the Environment

Move, inspect and analyze every detail of the ship to uncover its secrets and progress through the story.

Examine Objects and Discover Hidden Notes

Click on objects that catches your eye. Examine them from every angle and pay attention! You could find hidden notes!

Remember Simon's Past

Simon’s memories are fading. Collect them as you journey through the game. At the end of each level, a fragment of his past resurfaces, revealing echoes of a painful story…

Mars: This Little Guy is More Than Just a Cat to Simon

Mars is always by Simon’s side. But why? How? This curious and agile companion may hold the key to unlocking secrets and hidden passages.

Pay Attention to Simon's Heartbeat!

Darkness is not just a backdrop, it weighs on Simon’s mind. Stay in the shadows too long, and things will get harder. A word of advice: don’t linger in the dark… and use your flashlight wisely.
